column2: "Right now Ulc is in the middle of a committee meeting."
"She's due back any minute... although, I wouldn't be surprised if she took a detour on the way."
"She's found her true calling in this work, you see."
"Huh? Did I hear my name? Sorry, can't chat. I have another appointment, and I have to sort this data before then!"
"...The Medical team's operations report? I anticipated this, and finished it already."
"The health and wellness of all ARKS members lies in their hands, so it's critical we follow up on them!"
"I'm happy that you're working so hard for everyone onboard, but what happens if you get burned out?"
"Huh? ...Burned out? Do I look that exhausted to the both of you?"
"...Well uh, I think you look just fine."
"Then there's nothing to worry about, is there?"
"Sure, I might go overboard time to time, but if Theo says I'm fine, then it'll be all right."
"If the time comes that both of you say \"That's enough!\" then I promise to rest. Until then, I'd like to keep going."
"It's up to the both of you to keep an eye out for me, 'kay?"
